title: Signature verification (valid, invalid, tampered)
description: Verify that signature verification correctly handles valid signatures, wrong keys, and tampered payloads.

steps.action: Generate keypair A and sign payload {from:"bmo", text:"hello"}
Verify signature with keypair A public key and original payload
Tamper with payload (change text to "goodbye") and verify with same signature
Generate keypair B and verify original signature with keypair B public key
Pass an empty string as signature
